content: this is my version of the granny ripple wrap it is easy to find loads of patterns with this basic stitch this free pattern is to share my pattern presentation pattern presented in written format first written out in detail then in shorthand the pattern also includes a chart for those that find working with a chart easier i recommend reading through the written directions and reviewing the chart before beginning i consider this a beginner pattern stitches us terms chain and double_crochet the pattern is easily modified by adding more repeats in pattern work a short piece to join into a cowl or work until you have a long enough piece to make an infinity scarf or make an comforting wrap make it your own sample worked with two full cakes of lion brand mandala colorway brownies please let me know if you find any errors please tag me @beccascrazyprojects when you share your work on social media using #grannyhack i love to see what you are making
